name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The boy who lived begins his journey at Hogwarts.

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry returns to Hogwarts and discovers a hidden threat.

name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry learns more about his past—and a dangerous escapee.

name: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry competes in the dangerous Triwizard Tournament.

name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry faces challenges from inside and outside Hogwarts.

name: Harry Potter and the Half‑Blood Prince
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry uncovers secrets and dangers in the wizarding world.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The final battle begins as Harry searches for Horcruxes.

name: The Power of Your Subconscious Mind
author: Joseph Murphy
description: Unlock the hidden power within your subconscious.

name: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen, Vol. 1
author: Gege Akutami
description: Yuji Itadori begins his journey as a jujutsu sorcerer.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen, Vol. 2
author: Gege Akutami
description: Yuji and friends face curses at Tokyo Jujutsu High.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen, Vol. 3
author: Gege Akutami
description: Deeper into cursed spirits and character backstories.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen, Vol. 4
author: Gege Akutami
description: Constantly evolving stakes in the world of curses.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen, Vol. 5
author: Gege Akutami
description: Yuji faces powerful curses and learns more secrets.

name: Do Epic Shit
author: Ankur Warikoo
description: A motivational guide to living boldly and purposefully.

name: Shatter Me

description: A girl with a lethal touch is locked away, until she learns what she's truly capable of.

name: The Five People You Meet in Heaven
author: Mitch Albom
description: An old man learns the meaning of his life through five individuals he meets in the afterlife.

name: Haunting Adeline
author: H. D. Carlton
description: A dark romance about obsession, secrets, and deadly attraction.

name: Bridgerton
author: Julia Quinn
description: A Regency-era romantic saga full of wit, scandal, and society intrigue.

name: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
description: Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness.

name: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then stops speaking.

name: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.

name: Project Hail Mary

description: An astronaut wakes up alone on a spaceship with no memory of who he is or how he got there.

name: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge University.

name: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
author: V.E. Schwab
description: A young woman makes a Faustian bargain to live forever but is cursed to be forgotten by everyone she meets.

name: The Midnight Library

description: A novel about a library between life and death where each book represents a different life path.

name: The Four Winds

description: A story of one woman's survival during the Great Depression.

name: The Vanishing Half
author: Brit Bennett
description: Twin sisters grow up to live very different lives, one passing as white.

name: The Thursday Murder Club
author: Richard Osman
description: Four retirees meet weekly to solve cold cases until a real murder occurs.

name: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A classic novel about love, society, and marriage in 19th‑century England.

name: It Ends with Us

description: A powerful story about love, resilience, and difficult choices.

name: Verity

description: A chilling tale of secrets, lies, and obsession.

name: Ugly Love
author: Colleen Hoover
description: A heart‑wracking story of love, loss, and boundaries.

name: Twilight

description: A teenage girl falls in love with a vampire.

name: New Moon
author: Stephenie Meyer
description: Bella copes with the aftermath of Jacob’s return—and Edward’s absence.

name: Eclipse
author: Stephenie Meyer
description: A love triangle intensifies as a new danger approaches.

name: Breaking Dawn
author: Stephenie Meyer
description: The saga concludes with marriage, motherhood, and immortality.

name: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A shepherd boy travels to Egypt in search of treasure—and himself.

name: Where the Crawdads Sing

description: The ‘Marsh Girl’ becomes a murder suspect in a quiet North Carolina town.

name: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge University.

name: Little Fires Everywhere

description: Two families' lives intertwine amid secrets in a suburban community.
